text.title: Islamic State captures Syrian city of Palmyra
text.head: Islamic State captures Syrian city of Palmyra
Sources

list.item: "Islamic State captures last Syria-Iraq border post" — Channel 4 News , May 22, 2015
Caroline Alexander and Donna Abu-Nasr. "Islamic State Captures Palmyra as Militants Gain Momentum" — Bloomberg News , May 21, 2015
Sylvia Westall. "Islamic State says it has full control of Syria's Palmyra" — Reuters , May 21, 2015
"Islamic State seizes Syria's ancient Palmyra" — BBC News Online , May 21, 2015
